properties.description: Create GarminFiles DB and view for the activites data

content.query:
USE MASTER
GO

-- Drop database if it exists
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS GarminFiles
GO

-- Create new database
CREATE DATABASE [GarminFiles]
GO

USE GarminFiles
GO


-- There is no credential in data surce. We are using public storage account which doesn't need a secret.
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE MyGarminPQfiles
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://personalprojectsrslake.dfs.core.windows.net/')
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vwGarminActivity
GO

CREATE VIEW vwGarminActivity AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET
        (
        BULK '/personalprojectsfs/synapse/workspaces/personalprojectsrgsynapse/DataFiles/Garmin/garmin_get_activities_by_date-2*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'MyGarminPQfiles',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
        )
        WITH
            (
                activityId BIGINT,
                activityName VARCHAR (255),
                startTimeLocal DATETIME2,
                startTimeGMT DATETIME2,
                distance FLOAT,
                [duration] FLOAT,
                elapsedDuration FLOAT,
                movingDuration FLOAT,
                averageSpeed FLOAT,
                hasPolyline BIT,
                hasImages BIT,
                ownerId BIGINT,
                ownerDisplayName VARCHAR (255),
                ownerFullName VARCHAR (255),
                ownerProfileImageUrlSmall VARCHAR (255),
                ownerProfileImageUrlMedium VARCHAR (255),
                ownerProfileImageUrlLarge VARCHAR (255),
                calories FLOAT,
                bmrCalories BIGINT,
                averageHR BIGINT,
                maxHR BIGINT,
                steps BIGINT,
                userRoles VARCHAR (255),
                userPro BIT,
                hasVideo BIT,
                timeZoneId BIT,
                beginTimestamp BIGINT,
                sportTypeId BIGINT,
                deviceId BIGINT,
                summarizedExerciseSets VARCHAR (255),
                manufacturer VARCHAR (255),
                lapCount BIGINT,
                waterEstimated BIGINT,
                totalSets BIGINT,
                activeSets BIGINT,
                totalReps BIGINT,
                minActivityLapDuration FLOAT,
                splitSummaries VARCHAR (255),
                hasSplits BIT,
                moderateIntensityMinutes BIGINT,
                vigorousIntensityMinutes BIGINT,
                differenceBodyBattery BIGINT,
                pr BIT,
                autoCalcCalories BIT,
                elevationCorrected BIT,
                atpActivity BIT,
                favorite BIT,
                decoDive BIT,
                parent BIT,
                purposeful BIT,
                manualActivity BIT,
                [activityType.typeId] BIGINT,
                [activityType.typeKey] VARCHAR (255),
                [activityType.parentTypeId] BIGINT,
                [activityType.isHidden] BIT,
                [activityType.restricted] BIT,
                [activityType.trimmable] BIT,
                [eventType.typeId] BIGINT,
                [eventType.typeKey] VARCHAR (255),
                [eventType.sortOrder] BIGINT,
                [privacy.typeId] BIGINT,
                [privacy.typeKey] VARCHAR (255),
                [summarizedDiveInfo.summarizedDiveGases] BIGINT,
                elevationGain BIGINT,
                elevationLoss BIGINT,
                maxSpeed BIGINT,
                startLatitude FLOAT,
                startLongitude FLOAT,
                averageRunningCadenceInStepsPerMinute FLOAT,
                maxRunningCadenceInStepsPerMinute BIGINT,
                avgStrideLength FLOAT,
                minElevation FLOAT,
                maxElevation FLOAT,
                maxDoubleCadence BIGINT,
                maxVerticalSpeed FLOAT,
                locationName VARCHAR (255),
                endLatitude FLOAT,
                endLongitude FLOAT,
                vO2MaxValue BIGINT

            )
         AS uspv;


-- Test
-- select * from vwGarminActivity
